Text:
REFiNED is 696 pixels high.
LCHD is 688 pixels high.

REFiNED has 1 pixel of padding on the top and bottom.

To correct and maintain scene compliance LCHD removed an additional 8 pixels, meaning you are loosing 6 pixels of actual video footage (3 top, 3 bottom).

Just be aware of what you are getting.
